author: rbowen
msg: Turns out that well over half of the links in this document go nowhere.
Meanwhile, it's not actually linked to from anywhere on our site, and
Google finds just four places on the web that link to it, one of which
is our FAQ (link removed), one of which is a cvs commit message, and one
of which is a PPT file. I think it's probably best to just drop it.
